name: Fall Down (itch)
description:
Background story: A Child dreaming about falling down through a hole under his bed. After surviving from endless obstacles and terrifying monsters he finally reaches the end. Which, is his comfortable bed at home. He wakes up and happy to find that it's just a dream in his head. How to play: A/D key to move, J key to use quilt to defend the boy from monsters. Get to the boy's home on time to win this game .

Credits: 

Chen KANG(Programmer)

NOC(Art Design)

Chloe(Audio)

Special thanks to July CHIANG

Art assets are Fan Art of BAKUMATSU ROCK, the main character in this game is a member of BAKUMATSU ROCK who named KATSURA KOGORO.
